Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2014 11:46AM - edited Apr 8, 2014 10:14PM by jsquipu Hi Doxie, Like you I haven't been able to find a compression top that helps in the right areas. I too am about your size. I wear Spanx camisoles but they don't really provide much compression on my upper torso.  Yummi Tummi is another shapewear that I've tried but even their small is roomy and I found the UA boy's compression tops (found them in hockey shops carrying boy's clothing) were designed for boys with broader shoulders than mine.  This week I tried a bra by Wacoal that I've been wearing at night and during workouts.  Size 32 is snug and feels like it gives some compression that might help.  Wacoal smooth bralette
